ygData.subject: The second incarnation of the Trueshot bow
ygData.msgSnippet: Well here is a update... I have tried all of Felewthe with no luck and the High elf in OOT ..I have been looking many places for this elf that will respond to
ygData.messageBody:
Well here is a update... I have tried all of Felewthe with no luck and the High elf in OOT ..I have been looking many places for this elf that will respond to the phrase {where the enchanted bows}...
I have had no luck so I have put forward a prize / quest for this information... I will give a 100pp or a TS bow to the person that gives me the name and location of the high elf that responds to the statement above. I'm on bristlebane server only so this prizes is limited to this server.. but I will share any info I get with you my fellow master fletchers..
Take care
Karvar Blackhawk
